parameters.subject: Regarding the form you have fill
parameters.message: =Hi {{ $json.body.firstName }},  Thanks for getting in touch! I really appreciate your interest in automating your workflows with low-code tools like n8n, Make, and Zapier.  I help businesses streamline repetitive tasks, connect apps, and save hours every week ‚Äî all without complex coding. I‚Äôd love to learn more about what you‚Äôre trying to automate so I can share the best approach (and a few quick wins).  Could you reply to this email with a short description of your workflow or pain point? Once I have that, I‚Äôll send you a brief outline of how we can solve it efficiently.  Looking forward to chatting!  Best, Jijesh Raj AI & Automation Freelancer üåê xyx.com üìß jijeshrajk@gmail.com  üìû +91 7643521670
